title: U S  stocks lower at close of trade  Dow Jones Industrial Average down 0 06
content:
Investing com   U S  stocks were lower after the close on Wednesday  as losses in the Oil   Gas  Basic Materials and Technology sectors led shares lower 
At the close in NYSE  the Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 0 06   while the S P 500 index declined 0 58   and the NASDAQ Composite index fell 0 84  
The best performers of the session on the Dow Jones Industrial Average were United Technologies Corporation  N UTX   which rose 2 46  or 2 35 points to trade at 97 97 at the close  Meanwhile  Boeing Company  N BA  added 1 66  or 2 31 points to end at 141 19 and The Travelers Companies Inc  N TRV  was up 1 61  or 1 75 points to 110 70 in late trade 
The worst performers of the session were  Goldman Sachs Group  Inc  N GS   which fell 3 13  or 5 81 points to trade at 179 70 at the close  UnitedHealth Group Incorporated  N UNH  declined 1 92  or 2 31 points to end at 118 11 and  Pfizer  Inc  N PFE  was down 1 59  or 0 54 points to 33 46 
The top performers on the S P 500 were KLA Tencor Corporation  O KLAC  which rose 18 79  to 63 98  General Motors Company  N GM  which was up 5 79  to settle at 35 42 and  Intuitive Surgical Inc   O ISRG  which gained 5 58  to close at 499 41 
The worst performers were Endo International PLC  O ENDP  which was down 13 32  to 54 46 in late trade   St Jude Medical  Inc  N STJ  which lost 8 86  to settle at 62 30 and Range Resources Corporation  N RRC  which was down 7 19  to 33 30 at the close 
The top performers on the NASDAQ Composite were  NeoGenomics Inc   O NEO  which rose 24 65  to 7 080  KLA Tencor Corporation  O KLAC  which was up 18 79  to settle at 63 98 and Bel Fuse A Inc  O BELFA  which gained 17 08  to close at 21 80 
The worst performers were  Synta Pharmaceuticals  Corp  O SNTA  which was down 63 83  to 0 74 in late trade  Escalera Resources Co  O ESCR  which lost 18 44  to settle at 0 110 and  Concordia Healthcare Corp   O CXRX  which was down 14 97  to 23 12 at the close 
Falling stocks outnumbered advancing ones on the New York Stock Exchange by 1981 to 545 and 2 ended unchanged  on the Nasdaq Stock Exchange  1895 fell and 632 advanced  while 38 ended unchanged 
Shares in Endo International PLC  O ENDP  fell to 52 week lows  falling 13 32  or 8 37 to 54 46  Shares in The Travelers Companies Inc  N TRV  rose to all time highs  rising 1 61  or 1 75 to 110 70  Shares in Synta Pharmaceuticals Corp  O SNTA  fell to all time lows  losing 63 83  or 1 30 to 0 74  Shares in Concordia Healthcare Corp  O CXRX  fell to 52 week lows  falling 14 97  or 4 07 to 23 12  
The CBOE Volatility Index  which measures the implied volatility of S P 500 options  was up 5 33  to 16 59 
Gold for December delivery was down 0 92  or 10 80 to  1166 70 a troy ounce  Elsewhere in commodities trading  Crude oil for delivery in December fell 2 31  or 1 07 to hit  45 22 a barrel  while the December Brent oil contract fell 1 62  or 0 79 to trade at  47 92 a barrel 
EUR USD was down 0 04  to 1 1341  while USD JPY rose 0 05  to 119 92 
The US Dollar Index was up 0 18  at 95 07
